scripts.test:qa: newman run "e2e flows/Postman API Automation.postman_collection.json" --folder "E2E Flow" -e environments/QA.postman_environment.json -r cli,htmlextra,json,junit,allure --reporter-htmlextra-export newman/reports/html/qa-run.html --reporter-json-export newman/reports/json/qa-run.json --reporter-junit-export newman/reports/junit/qa-results.xml --reporter-allure-export newman/reports/allure-results
